review: Just received mine and so far so good! Love it!
author: Amazon Customer

review: No need for Premium Channels on DISH. Hulu and Netflix are more affordable and convenient.
author: Jimbo

review: On the face of it, the fire stick looks very attractive.  When I got started with it, I was sorely disappointed that I could find NOTHING to watch for free...not even old, old TV shows.  Maybe I'm missing something.  I'll keep trying.
author: Collette Bailey

review: I bought this after using the DVD player that has wifi support. With this stick, it is much easier to watch prime tv. We are very happy with it.
author: y.

review: it was ease to install and it delivers as advertise.
author: Jaime Novoa

review: Millions better then the Apple TV and google chrome cast.  U can side load other apps to watch XBMC
author: Toan Au
